I wanted best quality I could get at a price I could afford. So far, I feel I got a very good deal...a 55-inch TV with fast refresh rate under $700. I debated whether I should just get a 46-48 inch TV and save more money, but as much as I enjoy a home theater experience and sharing that with family and friends I decided the 55-inch was the one to get. It is a good size for my family room.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I've had this set for 6 months now and am very happy with it. Picture looked great right out of the box!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Parley G. Schenk
Reviews.Content: I had to find a TV at a reasonable price.  I'm very happy with the picture and satisfied with the sound.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Ownleewun
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. And, doesn't have all those excess features that bloats the price. The 3d, smart TV, and internet browsing etc. it is what it is a TV with all the features your looking for at this size with what seems like good quality parts. I was impressed with the glass stand and thin bezel makes the picture pop.Cons:the speakers make the back look bulky.the controller is oddly organized big.Bottom line I feel happy about the buy. I got this set for my parent's bedroom as an anniversary gift and they absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: robotopher
Reviews.Content: Like everyone else, I was worried because I hadn't heard of TCL before but after turning it on, I was very happy I pulled the trigger.  I've since bought a second one for my parents and a friend bought one after seeing mine as well.This is a no frills TV with limited inputs, but that is exactly what I wanted.  My htpc handles all my media, I just need a TV to produce an excellent picture and this does that perfectly.  This fully LED backlit panel looks great in direct sunlight or with all the lights off.  I haven't seen any other TV that beats the picture quality.The only con is the use of a digital coaxial audio out instead of the more prevalent optical.  But not a big deal depending on how your surround system is set up, which I recommend because the speakers aren't very good.The design  also looks really good with a very thin bezel around the screen and the included base is nice thick glass.  If you'll be wall mounting this TV, be warned its not the thinnest out there (due to the full backlighting) but I mounted the one I bought for my parents easily.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Anderson
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have ever bought for the money, a beautiful picture and the sound isn't too bad either. I have surround if I need to use it though so no biggie on sound.

Reviews.Title: What's that SOUND???
Reviews.Author: buddhaboy2
Reviews.Content: Purchased my TCL in December after much research. The price was half that of my 42 inch Sharp purchased just two years ago. Picture quality is excellent although dark screens show some pixelating and low level clutter. The sound quality is...well, get a sound bar at the least. The strangest thing is that after turning the set on, every twenty minutes or so I hear a sound coming from the interior of the set as if something is actually falling down inside the cabinet!  Similar to a wire or cable slipping down and hitting the plastic back or bottom. Makes no difference to the picture but it freaks me out that something is loose in there and is apparently being affected once the set warms up. (Never hear the sound when it's off).  I checked the mount and it's solid as a rock. Curious to see if anyone else has noticed this problem. Again, the pic is great and at under $700 you can't beat the price...I'm just wary of what's going on inside and hopeful it doesn't get any worse with time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for your buck!

No, you dont get the extra gadgets that you would with a $1500 TV and I do not need that either as I have A WII and xbox that do all the other stuff. I have surround sound that works perfect with it and so far I have no complaints at all. So, bottom line is ,, If your looking for a affordable basic TV.. this is it. YOu really cant go wrong with the 2 year warranty. Just keep in mind that even the really expensive high end models do have poor reviews also.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS
Reviews.Author: upstatemike
Reviews.Content: This tv was an upgrade from an old style tv and consequently is our first flat screen, HD type tv. Not being one who needs all the bells an whistle I was looking for a basic set that was 1080p and had a 120Hz refresh rate or higher. I was not looking for apps or internet connectivity. This tv was ordered on a wed and arrived on fri in its orignal box via Fed-ex. The box was in perfect condition. That night I set it up and have been very pleased with it. The picture is very nice and I have made no adjustments out of the box. I watched the Super Bowl on it and don't know how I ever enjoyed sports without it. Reviews.Title: Good, Simple Tv
Reviews.Author: Paul I
Reviews.Content: The very long and short of it is, the picture quality is great.  Very sharp and crisp, with vibrant colors.  The sound however is thin and very inadequate. Reviews.Title: Intro to The Creative Life
Reviews.Author: Malinda Washington
Reviews.Content: We had considered a Samsung and purchased an Insignia 55" TV at a local Best Buy store. Came home checked this TCL at Amazon and were determined that though we didn't know the brand we should take a chance.  The next day we canceled the Insignia (not yet delivered)  which cost considerably more and ordered this 55" TCL just before the Xmas, 2012 holidays (and we didn't have to pay a delivery fee or taxes as Best Buy charges). Reviews.Title: Worth waiting for at $499
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I had been waiting for quite a while to replace the 32 inch LCD I've been using for a year or so. At $499 this 48inch LED display seemed like a great deal and when I read the reviews here and elsewhere I was sold.Pros:Although the 240HZ refresh rate isn't a critical feature for a display primarily used with PC sources the contrast and dynamic LED backlight results in terrific picture quality. I found the feature set to be well organized and easy to use and the tuner has more than adequate sensitivity using an indoor antenna even 40 miles or more from some stations. Setup as a PC display can be tricky, especially if the TV is part of a multiple display environment because of aspect ratio and resolution limitations of some PC video adapters but this TV gave me no grief whatsoever. So far I am very pleased with the performance, backlight conformity and overall picture quality. And, no dead or stuck pixels. The glass base is very sturdy and adds a nice bit of weight to help stabilize the TV with a very small footprint.Cons:Even with the implied 240HZ refresh rate this is not a 3D capable TV. Just something to be aware of in case as some do, you assume that the high refresh rate means it is 3D compatible. For my purposes this is not an issue. There are also a limited number of predetermined selections for on-screen input labels. I prefer full text labels to more quickly identify connected sources. Lastly, the power cord is not detachable - I find this a bit odd and it can result in adding a little difficulty to some  installations but it's certainly not a show-stopper.I expect the price to creep up in the near future but even if it does the picture quality gives far more expensive 48" LED TV's a true run for the money.**** UPDATE ****After using the TCL LE48FHDF3300ZTA for a while now I still find myself thinking "I love this display." With the dynamic backlight, black is truly black, not dull gray. Viewing angle is incredible - I have it mounted directly above my home office desk because I frequently work and watch movies at the same time and even at close range and a steep viewing angle this beast is perfectly comfortable and easy to watch. I tend to keep the video attributes conservative but when I want to watch a blue-ray movie or live sports with high contrast and brightness this display is simply eye-popping and puts you right in the action. Even black and white movies from the 1940's and 1950's reveal the great cinematic attributes the filmmakers sought to present to the audience. I cannot say enough about this terrific machine except that I frequently wish I'd spent the extra bit for the 55 inch version.

Reviews.Content: I give this a 3 star rating for this TV. Reviews.Title: Tv

Reviews.Content: This is a great television. Never expected for a off brand to be so good. I would refer this product to who ever is looking for a nice television

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the money

Reviews.Content: Great deal for the money! If you dont need a smart TV this is the best deal going at this time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL AT A GREAT PRICE

Reviews.Content: We love this TV! We started shopping around after we saw such good deals on black Friday and after researching, we chose this TV. Reviews.Title: Very happy with picture and savings.
Reviews.Author: J. You "jyou374"
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the picture quality. I figured that if I watch this TV for 2 years (warranty period of this set), the money saved from not buying a high-end TV will be enough to buy another good TV.

Reviews.Title: Incredible buy
Reviews.Author: the bomber "amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: After my son's trial of the 32" for his gaming purposes, I have noticed the difference on the picture quality.  Therefore,  I purchased a 48" to replace my old tv.  Quick shipping, easy to install, elegant looking....this isnt Samsung...so why is this as crisp as Samsung? Reviews.Title: Tcl 55 inch led / lcd flat screenn television
Reviews.Author: mommy67
Reviews.Content: We were skeptical about purchasing a television we didn't get to see except for online. We never heard of the manufacture TCL. Thanks to all the other reviews from previous buyers on amazon we decided to go ahead and get it. The delivery was from a company called Ceva. They were very professional and ON TIME. After much trial and error, help with a very patient Directv agent, and our own persistance, we were able to find an RCA code to connect the Directv remote to the TV.  My husband tried over 30 codes.  The one he found which did work is:  11922The picture quality is okay, not great. Reviews.Author: Dawn Jasso
Reviews.Content: So far it has been a great buy.  Bought for my teenage son mainly for video gaming.  He loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv

Reviews.Content: The picture was great and works just fine, very happy with purchase, must get speakers to go with it, the stock ones are not that good.

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: wigglypiggly
Reviews.Content: We got the TV on time and I'm happy with it. Thanks for an affordable 55" TV @ about 700 bucks, TCL.

Reviews.Title: Great Value...
Reviews.Author: K lane
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price and it looks great mounted...I have anothe TCL TV mounted in my bedroom and it's just as awesome...

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Chamberlain
Reviews.Content: I have been using this TV for about two months and must say that it more than exceeded my expectations.  With the low price, I assumed there would be more concerns with picture quality and function.  However, this is not case. Reviews.Title: Solid unit, great value
Reviews.Author: Bruce  a Logan
Reviews.Content: the quality is good, easy to set up, no issues with shipping a large box,  only issue is that being very new Verizon does not have it in the remote so need to use two remotes,  the tv's for volume  and on/off. this will change in the future.  it is the best value for large screen if you do not want to pay up for the Smart ones that are out today.  people need to keep in the mind the size and often high def quality is function of the original filming so it is what you are getting sent not what the tv creates.  did my homework on the manufacturer that gave me better comfort in buying a name not known in USA. been using it for 2 months now and very happy with it overall.

Reviews.Content: This TV looks great....and I couldn't beat the price, $799 cyber monday.The only issue is that it takes a good 30 seconds for it to actually turn on and show a picture, after you hit the power button. It has a great pic and lots of easy to understand options to make adjustments if necessary. I would look into another one of these in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Would have been 5 stars but it came with a few missing pieces
Reviews.Author: Santiago Valdez
Reviews.Content: it came with a few missing pieces from the stand , but all in the the Tv quality & picture are amazing GREAT investment

Reviews.Title: Pretty good deal for the money
Reviews.Author: D. Sanderson
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV to replace our aging rear-projection 42" Samsung.  Overall, this was a significant upgrade, and so far I am pleased with the purchase.Setup was very simple.  But you'll need two people.  The unit isn't heavy, but it's awkward.  The glass pedestal is sturdy and looks nice.  You'll need a phillips to screw the bracket and stand to the unit, but that only took a few minutes.  The input jacks were clearly marked.  I hooked up the Tivo unit and a DVD with no problems, and when I turned it on, everything came up perfect.The remote control unit is well designed, but of course, I wanted to use the Tivo remote with the new TV.  My Tivo is a few years old, so it didn't have the codes for any TCL brands,  which was not unexpected.  I couldn't find any compatible codes via an Internet search, so I bought a new Tivo remote with the learning capability.  I had no trouble making it "learn" the remote codes, and I actually like the new Tivo remote better than the old one.The picture is nice and bright and crisp. Our Tivo unit outputs 1080i, not 1080p, so I'm probably missing out on even more sharpness just because of that, but it's a great picture.  You'll probably want to tweak the color settings a bit.  I found some of the faces in the live news broadcasts to look a little pasty, so I backed down the contrast a little, and also made a slight adjustment to the color settings.The only negative I have to note is the speakers.  They are crap.  The sound was tinny and hallow, and no amount of adjusting the equalizer made it sound any better.  So I bought some nice computer speakers for less than $100, and now it sounds great.  So, if you buy this TV, plan to buy either computer speakers or a sound bar, or else your media experience will be less than you'd like.  That's the only reason I'm dinging this by one star.You can't beat the price.  We've had the unit for less than a month, so I can't vouch for the longevity or service, but so far, I'm pretty happy.

Reviews.Title: Still haven't received the neck to attach tv to the stand

I've gotten a hold of someone a couple times and they said they'd call me a couple days later (when a new shipment was supposed to come in) whether they had the part or not.  Never got a call back either time.Also, the coaxial input didn't work, but I plan to use hdmi anyways, so I let that go.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: All I wanted is TV with good picture and this is just it. TV looks awesome and it is really easy to use as there is nothing unnecessary stuff that most of us just do not need!

Reviews.Content: I read the other poor reviews and the 5 star reviews as well.In my opinion, the TV is worth much more then the price tag, the picture is great, hook up was easy, I found the sound quality to be excellent and the controls are user friendly. Reviews.Title: Good product for the price

Reviews.Content: Product works well, picture is not a great as I had expected.  Our previous TV was a samsung and the picture was crystal.  However for the price point I think this TV is worth buying.

Reviews.Content: Recieved this T.V. when expected. Set it up right away, and out of the box had a great picture, easy to use and set up!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture and nice size TV.
Reviews.Author: JUSTLOOKIN' "lookin' for a deal"
Reviews.Content: I am quite satisfied with my new TCL TV.  I chose it in part because of the 2 year warranty, most brands have one year at best.  It has a great picture. Reviews.Title: Excellent price for a TV this size and quality!
Reviews.Author: dmiller258
Reviews.Content: I have had my TV about a month now. I am very satisfied with this TV and feel this was a great purchase!The TV has excellent picture quality, and sound. The TV is very attractive to look at and I love the thin bezel.When  connected to my blue ray with the home theater system is is a great entertainment center. Reviews.Title: good deal

Reviews.Title: Great Price for a massive TV

Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month and love it. It may not be a fancy or as well renown as a Sony or something like that but I could buy two of these for the price of one of those. I believe the site is wrong and the TV is only 120Hz though.

Reviews.Content: The price was great and the picture is the best I have seen - I own a samsung and a sharp aquos quattron as well and the TCL beats them both.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price, save $ by not having the 'smart TV' features ...
Reviews.Author: tgtech
Reviews.Content: Took some time to get the brightness and contrast settings set properly, but after some tweaking the picture looks great.  I have the TV hooked up to a home media PC. Since there are a LOT of settings for brightness/contrast for the PC itself, it was kind of trial and error to get good settings established between the computer and the TV. I'm quite sure with a standard cable box with HDMI output, the picture will look great.I didn't want or need all the 'smart TV' web browsing and streaming capabilities that are offered by other brands since my PC can stream Amazon Prime movies, Netflix and other media. I've heard (and read) that these 'smart TV' applications for web browsing and streaming in other brands are quite limited in their usability and capability anyway.  Being a techie, I opted for this 'dumb' TV which has a great picture at an outstanding price.

Reviews.Title: Best Bargain of the Season

Reviews.Content: I chose this Tv for the warranty and found the picture quality excellent.  It was very easy to set up and I am the original electronic idiot.  Would buy this again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: good tv

Reviews.Content: This was what I had hoped for, the price was right on and picture is great. I installed on wall in bedroom and enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: T. Barnett "T. Barnett"
Reviews.Content: I waited a month so I could get to know the TV in order to write a review on it.I downsized from a 60" Projection HDTV and purchased the TCL 55" through Amazon.I received it right on time and the shipping box was handled well by the shipper.So far, overall it has turned out to be well worth the money I spent.It has a great picture and is well made for the price when comparing other brand models that cost more.The speakers have an ok sound but you may want to hook up other externals or even a surround sound system if you want better sound.I do wish that there were more AV/component in/out hookups to accommodate more equipment, which is the only way you will probably feel shortchanged on this brand if you have alot of equipment to hook up.The base is a heavy black glass platform which stabilizes the tv very well.B+/A- .........A Very Good Deal!

Reviews.Title: TCL 55"

Reviews.Content: great colors, vivid picture. overall great tv. I'll update if something goes wrong, but as for now its an incredible tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture/ Great Price

Reviews.Title: Allot for the money
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture! Better than expected for the money. The sound is decent, may get a surround sound system in the future. But plenty good for now.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for the money.

Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Simple, elegant design. Outstanding picture quality using DirecTV. I couldn't be happier with the quality and value. This is my second TCL product.

Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV. Great color and sound. Few quirks I've found are TV will not sync with a Comcast remote so you have to buy a universal remote if you don't want two. Reviews.Author: kmc
Reviews.Content: Great TV, especially for the price. This is my first time buying a flat screen or flat panel, and I have never had cable tv until now, so I am not an expert on picture quality. However, the picture is beautiful. The other day we noticed something looked fuzzy but I think it was the channel and we probably didn't have the HD on or on an HD channel. The remote works great. Its more responsive than the one we received from the cable guy. And for $479, it has the 240 refresh rate which based on my research, is a must.The only problem I ran into was setting up the stand. It turns out that they were the correct size, it just takes finesse and patience to get them in, and having two people would have helped. It's not a one person job.We are thrilled with this television. I have had it for a month.

Reviews.Title: good but could be better

Reviews.Content: the tv works good and for the money it was by-far the best deal i could find. however it is now the best of quality. when i was putting the stand onto the tv the heads of the screws were starting to get messed up, the screws were too soft and the grooves were getting widened and i had to use a little grease to help the screws in so i didn't damage the screws more. also the tv is "cloudy" at some points. mostly with solid colors but it does happen other times. other than that the tv has been great, and i have been happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great value so far

Reviews.Title: Great picture at a great price!

Reviews.Content: I got this 2 weeks ago and only tested it for about 20 minutes but so far it looks great! I attached a PS3 via HDMI cable and tested two games + Adventures of Tin Tin Blu-Ray & the Avengers Blu-Ray.The picture clarity and colors were top notch! Next week I'll hook it up to the Dish Network box to see how it looks with "real" Tv. I didn't see any weird bleeding in the corners & no dead pixels. When it's on a blue screen there are some patches that are slightly darker than other areas but I can't notice this when an actual picture is present.My reason for ommiting one star is due to it only having 2 HDMI inputs and I'm not exactly sold on their 240HZ claim but as long as my movies play fine and normal that's all that matters. I just bought a PS3 so I still need to test it out a bit.Many seem happy with this deal at $500 so when I consider what I paid for it (won't list it here out of respect for Amazon but it was a very popular Black Friday deal) this was a total bargain!This was the #2 deal for an LED TV I saw since Black Friday, the #1 deal being the Amazon Lightning Deal of $688 for the 60 inch Vizio that has an awesome picture with 4 HDMI inputs. Unfortunately it sold out before I could add it to the cart but this will work just fine and I'll save over $200 as well.If you use the stand I think it looks nice and is solid glass.Noah

Reviews.Title: Outstanding quality product
Reviews.Author: Seaweid
Reviews.Content: OK..  was a little hesitant buying this at first, but after reading the reviews and searching other sites/stores for same type product I went ahead and bought it at a very good price with Amazon. (I waited for it to be in stock AT Amazon to get free shipping and better pricing).Received it is good condition even though box had a couple of "dings" in it and the inside foam tray was broken.  The unit however was not harmed and all looked good.  We mounted it on the wall and it came on with no issues.  Very easy to use, outstanding screen color, and picture.  Speakers are not bad but not big surround sound, but when hooked up to a home system it completes it all and now we enjoy hi-def TV at home without breaking the bank!  It is for us the perfect size for our 20 X 32 foot room.  I read this manufacture is the second largest make in China, kind of like Sony and Toshiba in Japan.  All I can say is I am glad Amazon sells them.  Also it comes with a full 2 year warranty!  They also make a 55" for a couple hundred more, but that seemed to big for us in this room, (maybe in 3 years when I need that to see - Ha!)We like it and recommend the brand.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY!! ESPECIALLY THE WIFE!
