Reviews.Content: PICTURE PERFECT, FOR A UNHEARD BRAND! TCL WILL GET FAR, MY FAMILY IS VERY HAPPY WITH THIS FLAT SCREEN ITS BEEN TOO LONG!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love this TV
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: No gimmicks, just a good solid piece of equipment. Great picture and easy to mount. Very good tv antenna receiver.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Samjam
Reviews.Content: Great picture, I mean perfect! It really surpassed my expectations and gives the best quality picture in the house. I have a 42" Vizio 240hrtz TV also, and the picture on the TCL is much better. The only thing missing is an optical audio out jack. It has a digital coax out, but no optical. Otherwise, absolutely no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Great tv, regardless of price!
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: A lot of reviewers will say "Great tv for the price!" which could be misleading and sounds like a "you get what you pay for" review.  I read just about every review on this tv because I wasn't familiar with the TCL brand.  If I was going to take a chance on this product, I was going to do as much research as possible.  From the reviews it sounded like it was a great tv.  Those people who have phd's in tv technology may think its a good but not great tv, but for those of us average people who know just enough to want a requirement of a 1080p, 240Hz LED HDTV, this is a great tv.  And in my humble opinion, it is a great tv for significantly less than the other tv's of similar size and requirements!  Google it, see for yourself.Though I'm not familiar with the TCL brand, the tv I received works great.  Clear/sharp HD picture, enough connections (and then some) to suit my needs, looks great on the wall, plenty of picture adjustments, etc.Before researching 48"-50" flatscreens, I already assumed volume and sound would be an issue with any tv with small framing around the screen.  The sound is ok, not great as I expected but after connecting to my surround sound and subwoofer, it sounds great.I chose the 5-8 day shipping and 2 days into the shipping I thought I probably should've chosen 2-day shipping so that would be 3-5 less days banging around inside a shipping truck.  Shipping came on time, to my surprise the box was not beat up.  The tv had no visible physical defects, and worked like it was supposed to.  All-in-all, I feel I bought a great tv for what I think is a great price and it does what I want it to do.  I can't really ask for more as customer... except for a free tv with free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Purchase
Reviews.Author: Judd Danielson
Reviews.Content: As a first time big screen HDTV buyer, I could not be happier with my purchase and the product.I have had the TV for about 3-4 days now and it was a snap to set up and run. The picture qualityis fantastic and I went from a Hitachi 42" Plasma unit that was awesome but this unit is just as goodand alot BIGGER!Pro's: great picture, easy set up, great options to play with.Con's: Sound is all I can comment on, wish it had better speaker arrangements.  (But then a 7.1 SS is the ticket with this big screen)For under $500 it was a steal if you ask me. I definitely recommend the company and it's products.fyi: It has Samsung parts in it, so if that helps at all you can rest assured there is quality in this unit.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: Chuck "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad TV overall, however, the sound fluctuates from channel to channel.  I would recommend this TV.  It works perfectly in the bedroom or a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: TCL TV
Reviews.Author: eileen meyer
Reviews.Content: Enjoying it. so much easier than watching the old one. Would buy again when this one wears out. Loving it.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, Great price
Reviews.Author: DD Recruits "Danielle"
Reviews.Content: What a deal! Love this TV and so does everyone that sees it. Great reviews and a great price! Took me a bit longer then expected to set it up (but that may be user error). The only complaint I have is that I can't find a code to set up the TV to my Comcast remote.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: J. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Edited to add: I've seen a number of people asking about DirecTV remotes and this TV; 11953 works properly, with our RC64 remote.I've only had this TV for one day, so I can't speak to long-term reliability yet. First impressions are very good, though. I wanted a big screen, low power consumption, and didn't want 3D, apps, or Wi-fi. The  positive reviews for this TCL sold me.Setup was quick and painless, though coming from an older 32" LCD to this took a few minutes to adjust. The thin bezel and glass stand look good, in an understated way, and I had no issues with the 4 screws used to secure the base. Since the TV had been in a cold delivery truck for hours, I let it warm up to room temperature for an hour before turning it on. This isn't mentioned in the manual, but I've seen it spoken to many times, and it seemed reasonable.I connected a DirecTV DVR via HDMI, and an upconverting DVD player via component cables. The picture looked just fine on ECO mode (the stock setting), and the sound was fine to my ears. I did turn the "surround" effect on, but haven't noticed much difference. HD programming looks fantastic, but lower resolution stuff can look a little blurry, which I expected. I'm sure part of this is the size of the TV and our seating distance (11 feet). DVDs look good, for the most part, and once we upgrade to Blu-Ray, I'm sure we'll be suitably impressed. I haven't noticed any clouding or backlight bleed, but our living room is reasonably well lit most of the time.That leads to my one minor complaint: the screen is more to the glossy side, and we needed to adjust a lamp to eliminate a reflection. If this will be in a sunny room, you'll want to get some light-blocking curtains.I do have a couple other complaints, but again, they're minor: 2 HDMI ports is the bare minimum for a TV this size. I'd like to have another, or perhaps 4 total. I can always swap a device in or out, and I suppose most people have a receiver that handles the HDMI switching.I'm very happy with this purchase, and as our home theater grows, this should really come into it's own.

Reviews.Title: 48-inch
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Hooked the TV up as soon as it arrived.  Compared to all others I was looking at it is by far the best deal.  Keeping in mind it is only the first day.... It looks better than our SHARP bought 2 years ago.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this TV.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "of BMMT"
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV. I read the associated reviews with attention to adjustments recommended at set up. I read the instructions shipped with the TV and performed the install and set up with no surprises, went through the menu and set things to my satisfaction. Input from tuner box, HDMI computer cable, and memory stick all work great. Digital audio out requires an adaptor box to connect to my old stereo but with the TV simulated surround sound I have not missed it. Headphone jack connection disables TV speakers as usual.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Frankie
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, sharp picture, this was a good buy given the quality of the set.  Plus, it came quickly.  Only problem was the shipper delivered it to a hotel near by, with a similar address, but with only two number transposed; go figure.  But the set is fine.  I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tina Roehl
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Easy set up, great picture and sound. I would definitely buy another TCL the next time I am in the market for a TV.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: majellan
Reviews.Content: Like most everybody this off brand in the US was a little concerning, BUT, other reviews pushed me toward taking the risk.  It worked out wonderfully.  At first I was not please with the picturebut changed the imput to the HDMI 1 and let it burn in a little.  Now it is as good as any of the other 2 more expensive LED's sets I have.  Sound is good, but only using it as a TV, not a sound system.  For $500 its a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: ditter
Reviews.Content: It's been a month since i got the tv and everything works ok. There is a couple of things that I like to mention, the IR receiver in the tv is kind of weak, at least when I use my cable remote control, I have to point exactly in the direction of the IR receiver. The picture I think is amazing for 500.00 but if you look at the tv from the side about 45 degrees from the front the picture kind of washed out.  I'm not sure if every LED would do that.Over all I'm very happy with it and I'll recomend it.If you have a question about it feel free to  reply

Reviews.Title: tcl 48 inch
Reviews.Author: bjb
Reviews.Content: For the money you can't beat this TV I wanted a big TV without the big cost I did alot of research and decided to go with the Tcl trust me you won't be disappointed great TV great warranty just not alot of extras I probably wouldn't use anyway Amazon was great also

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: shana klick
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter.  She loves it.  She is able to hook up her DVD and XBox easily.  Great pic and sound.  Overall, she is very happy.  It will be easy to transport to college next year.

Reviews.Title: looks great
Reviews.Author: J Metz "J"
Reviews.Content: tv works great and a great price.  very light due to LED design.  I would highly this TV to others

Reviews.Title: Excellent price.
Reviews.Author: Karlene Moncrieffe
Reviews.Content: It arrived the next day. Excellent service and very good price. I love the 240 HZ. It looks very bright in the den.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Joe Lopez
Reviews.Content: Great looking TV it may not have all the gadgets but my blu ray player does, and makes all the differences because  it makes it up on the picture

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jonathan A. Bussard
Reviews.Content: I never expect much when I choose budget items, but the quality of this TV blew me away. The colors are amazingly vibrant, and the detail is great. My brother-in-law has a LED Samsung from about 2 years ago, and the quality of this TCL is actually superior to that. Completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price...
Reviews.Author: Ryan Rostad
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a couple of weeks now, and have had zero problems...  I'm no techno geek, but do know a good picture when I see it... Well worth the $500 I spent on it...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Douglas McCauley
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first when I bought the tv for only 699 but after setting it up and using it I couldnt be happier about my purchase.  everything looks great.  it isnt worth paying extra for an internet connected tv when you can add that on for $50 afterwords.  The only negative to the tv so far is that if you have a low profile mount its hard to reach the ports on the back of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and high quality
Reviews.Author: ChRe "ChRe"
Reviews.Content: An excellent buy for a mid-range TV. High quality imaging.  Great appearance. Speaker quality not great, but acceptable.  Easy to set up. Biggest complaint: removing the yellow energy sticker left a glue streak on the side, which is nearly impossible to remove.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Schroeder
Reviews.Content: Tv has a great picture good enough sound and it is a perfect size for us. One neg for us is the remote code is not available on our Directv system so we need to use two remotes. This TV is a great value in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: 55-Inch TCL.  Pretty Good Picture.  Worth the $. Sound is Terrible
Reviews.Author: Chris Kokat
Reviews.Content: First of all, I do not write many reviews.  I will be as honest in this review.  The reason for a 4 out of 5 is due to the fact that you can buy a 55" Tv for under $1,000 that has a decent quality image is amazing.  The picture is very good, a little grainy, and needs to be tweaked a little.  The 240HZ doesnt seem as good as others but is pretty good. THE SOUND IS TERRIBLE!You need to have a sound bar or something to obtain some good quality sound. Overall impressions are the it is a decent TV but you could obtain a better qaulity picture and TV if you spent the additional $.  However, for a low budget this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Actually I like the TV.
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Whaley
Reviews.Content: Actually I like the TV.  It has a great picture but 2 months into use it has begun acting up.  Working with customer service to resolve the issue.NOW - about an hour after the above review - Amazon has taken action to replace the TV without cost!  Since the the 4th TCL LED TV I've purchased in the last year I feel pretty confident that I just got a set with a manufacturing problem and I'm confident the replacement will be great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Matthew J Cesek
Reviews.Content: Nice TV with good picture and sound would def. reccomend to a friend and for the price you can beat it

Reviews.Title: Great value and picture
Reviews.Author: Drew Heale
Reviews.Content: Easy setup and will buy another one. Recommended. Fast shipper!! No problems so far. Easy remote to use and setup TV with.

Reviews.Title: Very low price with  and unbelievable great Picture
Reviews.Author: kjji
Reviews.Content: The Picture is even better than my another one year old 55" $1500 Toshiba.  The TV speaker is not that great but not a issue for me with connecting my Onkyo HT-S3500 system.

Reviews.Title: Good, Not Great
Reviews.Author: J. Manning
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my smaller plasma Panasonic to this TV.  The size is great in my living room and the actual design of the TV looks great.  My only small complaint is that the picture quality is not as great as I would have hoped.  For the price, however, I will not complain one bit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture on this TV!
Reviews.Author: Barb & Trey in VA
Reviews.Content: Paid less that $500 for this on Amazon and have had the TV for two weeks. So far I am impressed with this no name brand just like the reviews that helped win me over. This is a great "no frills" tv with  fantastic price.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Robert Benham
Reviews.Content: Was real hesitant to order this because I personally have never heard of TCL but with all the positive reviews I figured I'd take a chance,I ordered it on a Monday and was scheduled for a Delivery the following Monday. Wed. got a call asking if I'd like it sooner, said sure and it was delivered Thurs. very nice. My wife said the delivery guys were great. Because the outside temp was cold they couldn't test it for a blue screen until it warmed up, so I did it when I got up for work,Was a breeze to set up, a basic TV I guess. Without  side by side comparison I'd have to say the picture is every bit as good as the more expensive tv's in the store. My only complaints if I had any is that the remote seems a little weak. I have a open floor plan in my house and we are used to being able to use the remote in the kitchen if we wanted. Will also be getting a surround sound, gotta turn it up pretty loud to hear it good.All in all, a great purchase for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: Pretty good TV.  A little bit of tweaking needed.  The menu and on screen display is kinda generic, however, the picture is still there.

Reviews.Title: Great product, looks fantastic!
Reviews.Author: S. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is my second TCL TV set, the first being a 32" LCD which has been fantastic. I have owned that set for over a year with no issues. I received this set a week ago and so far it has impressed me with its style and picture quality. There is noticeable flash-lighting on dark screens, but other than that the picture quality is fantastic and easily compares with sets twice its price. As another reviewer stated, flash-lighting is apparent on many LED TV's and like I said, it's only noticeable on dark screens.As far as sound, mine is hooked up to my surround sound so I don't listen to the TV anyway, but I did test the speakers and they sounded good for TV speakers.Smart TV, well I think it's smarter to purchase a blue-ray with the options and save your money on the TV. I recently saw a nice Samsung for $79 that would do the trick.This is a great TV and I love the way it looks, clean lines and stylish as well as a great picture quality. Do yourself a favor and purchase this TV, with the money you save, who cares if it doesn't have a fancy name brand.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Scott B. Badger
Reviews.Content: Others have expressed problems after purchasing this TV.  My experience was perfect. Fast delivery. Professional set up. Picture is exquisitely clear and perfect size for our living room. Two year warranty in case I need it.  Reimbursed an additional $50 when the price dropped...Come on bowl week!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, very enjoyable
Reviews.Author: tai chi
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 2 weeks and so far liked it very much. I made my decision to purchase this TV based on the reviews on this site, and am glad that I made the right move. Thought of putting the feedback here to help more people with their purchasing decision. It is a very good TV with good picture. The sound is also not bad at all. Totally worth the money, and maybe even more.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This was my second TCL purchase from Amazon. I took a chance with the TCL brand when I purchased a new 40" TV for my daughter. I didn't expect a whole lot given the price, but I was pleasantly surprised. The TCL seems to be good quality, and I like the glass base plate and overall style.I purchased this 48" TV for my bedroom. I am completely happy with this TV. The picture quality is great, and I enjoy watching it just as much as the Samsung in the living room that cost 2x as much.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV - Merry Christmas to Me!
Reviews.Author: vmcferrin
Reviews.Content: Received my new TV today.  The delivery man was kind and courteous and set my TV up.  Although he was late, he was very considerate and called to let me know he was not going to delivery within the set delivery time.  I appreciated that.  The picture on the TV is sharp with much clairty.  I just love it!  The blacks are great and the colors jus POP out with much definition.  Great product for a minimal price.  It looks just as good as my Panasonic which I paid over $1,000 for.  This TCL TV looks very expensive and looks great in my family room.  If you are looking for a great TV at a great price, this is it!  I noticed the price has gone up by $50 since I purchased mine a week ago.  This TV comes with technican service for 30 days and it has a 2 year warranty.  You get service and a great TV for only $699. Buy this TV...you will not be disappointed.  If you want to program with FIOS remote use RCA code 0074.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Television for the price
Reviews.Author: mizzle
Reviews.Content: Let me save you some time looking through other reviews. This was a great purchase for the money. I was skeptical at first because of the brand TCL. If you are too, head over too [...] and you will notice it's a full fledged site; no gimmicks. They are China's second largest domestic TV manufacturer and I believe they use Samsung LCDs.I bought this TV to game, watch movies, etc. The picture quality is superior, I would give the sound a B, but you didn't buy the TV for the sound. If you are toying around with the idea, don't hesitate any longer, you won't be sorry about this purchase. I've been using for 2 days now and have had nothing but an exceptional experience.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Justin Hevly
Reviews.Content: No issues what so ever. Not sure what others are experiencing. Picture and everything is great. Motion refresh is claimed 240Hz seems to be more like 120Hz. Just not as smooth or real as other 240Hz like Vizio or Samsung. Haven't watched enough yet. Overall very happy. 2 yr warranty so I'm not worried. Great Value!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Robert T Flores
Reviews.Content: Can't buy a better TV for the price!  Easy setup, my only issue is that cable remote doesn't work with this TV, so I have to use my tv remote to control the TV. Where my Sharp TV works only using my cable remote.  Picture is as good or better than my Sharp television.

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Foth
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound with this "no name" brand of HDTV.  Easy to set up and run through TIVO box.  Had to search on Internet to learn controller codes due to TCL's not being a brand name, but found information easily.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality for the money
Reviews.Author: Ada
Reviews.Content: I have the tv 2 weeks & so far I'm very happy with it. For the price, I think it comparable to other LCD tvs. I did have a problem with TCL customer service (or lack of it). However, Amazon came through & made up for the mishap. Thank you Amazon

Reviews.Title: Yeee!
Reviews.Author: Alexis Perez
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I had some issues with tiger direct for their cyber monday deals. To make a long story short, we will never purchase anything from them again. But because our previous TV order was screwed up we found this TV. We ordered it two days ago, regular shipping, and it was delivered earlier today. Yay free shipping and it made it here in two days!! Anyway- the picture is perfect and clear as can be. I was a little worried it would be weird and pixely with some things (like when HD didn't exist and dial-up was still cool) but it isn't. I am very please with this glorious TV! Thanks Amazon & all it's people for being reliable!!

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: George Francis
Reviews.Content: When I saw the TCL LED HDTV 48" TV on Amazon for $477, I said to myself, this must be some low quality TV seeing that I had never heard of TCL before. Anyhow, I went ahead and purchased it. When I received the TV in two days, I was a bit skeptical about it. I then opened the box and was impressed with the packaging and the ease in assembling the TV. After I was finished assembling the TV and turned it on, my wife, two daughters and me all shouted, "Wowwwwww" at the same time because of the high quality of the pictures. I am having a blast watching all my favorite TV shows and movies. Great buy! Great product!!

Reviews.Title: Good Big Screen HDTV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Big Dog
Reviews.Content: Love the TV, good quality, stand was a bit difficult installing, but not too bad.  Wish there were more HDMI Ports. Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: potny
Reviews.Content: This is the second TCL I've gotten.  I Set this up for my parents, it replaced a 46" rear projection.  I recommended this to my dad because the 40" that I got over a year ago, LCD version, is a great TV.

Reviews.Title: 2nd TCL and counting
Reviews.Author: G. Sanderson
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 39 inch for work to be used as a computer monitor (flawless as a monitor) and liked it so much i bought a 48 inch for my home. This is not a brand i was familiar with however they have won me over. Price is amazing for such quality and it came UPS without a scratch. Very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Brian Mac "maccve"
Reviews.Content: First of all, this is a basic LCD/LED...nothing fancy...although it looks really nice!  It does what we need it to do and was cheaper than anything I could find.  I finally got my Direct TV receiver adjusted properly and the picture couldn't be better!  I bought this to replace a 10 year old rear projection HDTV that was in a custom built entertainment center.  This TV fit perfectly into the custom opening and the screen is bigger!  If you want 3D or an internet connected TV or something with awesome sound, this is not your choice.  We have a big movie room downstairs where all of those needs are met...this one is up in the living room and is great for what we use it for!  May get a sound bar in the future to improve the sound quality, but it is acceptable for now!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: datadde
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic TV. It has very thin borders, perfect picture, audio, but costs less money!. The remote controller has fewer buttons but easier to use. It can smoothly switch among different channels faster without any flash. All my family like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Psych Doctor
Reviews.Content: I just got the TV delivered and set it up myself. I am very impressed with the picture on this compared to my Toshiba 46" LCD HDTV. You can definitely tell the difference in picture clarity on Blu-ray movies. I tortured myself thinking about whether I should go all the way and get the smart 3d with all the bells and whistles, but since I have an X-box with wireless access to Netflix, etc and can hook up my computer too, I went for total value for the buck. A terrific buy at $479.00

Reviews.Title: Excellent value TV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd TCL HD Television. It arrived well packaged, and 3 days ahead of schedule. It set up very easy and I was watching a movie on it within an hour of arrival. Our other set was purchased last year and it also set up quickly and has been problem free so far.Amazon is truely an excellent place to shop. I have had no issues with them and you get what they advertise. The price for this set was $699. This is for a 55" 1080P 240HZ television. Look around and I would be willing to bet you will not find anything even close. The picture quality is excellent and I have not had any issue with the sound. I am sure one can find a higher quality TV that has more options like 3D, built in WiFi, etc. This TV is basic and has only 2 HDMI slots which was find for our use.So in closing if your looking for value for your dollar this is it. O'h it also comes with 30 day tech support thru Amazon, and a 2 year limited Warrenty which I beleive is unique.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Clong
Reviews.Content: Excellent screen quality, vibrant, clear, sharp, and no screen tearing.  Awesome buy for the price.  Will recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Picture is great. Sound is not impressive (normal as it is a thin TV). So far so good. Low price but high quality.Update: Still a great TV after 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Beautiful Picture for the price.
Reviews.Author: Philip Frisch
Reviews.Content: So this is my first LED TV, but in comparison to some of friend's TV's, it's truly amazing. Images are crisp and clear, and honestly i might start paying for HD cable just to utilize this tv. Some of the screen loading can be a bit on the laggy side, but it's no better or worse that most tvs i have encountered. Using windows 7 in 1080p on a 48 inch tv is quite an experience.Bottom line: This is a hell of a good TV for an amazing price.Cons: 240 Hz really isn't noticable over a 120 Hz or even 60 Hz. It doesn't generate a true motion picture that i was expecting, but it is still an excellent picture nonetheless. If you're looking for true motion (which makes your movies look way more fake and cheap than they should, by the way), then go for a samsung, or some other 1200 TV of the same size.Other thoughts: Go with an X shaped mount over a parallel bar style mount. I put this onto a mountable tv stand, and i had to put it on the lowest height on the bar in order for it to fit, due to the speakers in the bottom backside of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: whipchain
Reviews.Content: The set-up was pretty easy, and being this is my first flat screen, I think I did a good job.  Like most of the other reviews, I agree this is a no-frills set with a great picture.  It's definitely worth the money for this TV.  IMO, this will be the next big TV brand in the US, due to its affordability.

Reviews.Title: Green TVs...DO NOT BUY 55" TCL TV!
Reviews.Author: Taurus
Reviews.Content: The first 55" TCL TV that we received did not work right out of the box for the men delivering the TV. It was GREEN and would NOT adjust normally! The second TV worked well for a couple months then it also turned GREEN ...AFTER the SECOND TV even Amazon wouldn't help any more.( I order EVERYTHING from Amazon because they usually stand behind their customers. This time they told me it was now out of their hands.) TCL promised to repair the TV AGAIN...who wants to be without a TV off and on until the warranty expires, then be stuck with a problem? Terrible company customer service; JUSTno help at all...JUST POLITE EMAILS THAT LED ME TO BELIEVE THAT THEY WOULD HELP!No refund available from TCL after not one but two lemons ! I would never buy anything else from this company... I have a family of attorneys and will now seek their help on the Lemon Laws, etc...no other recourse unless Amazon helps get a refund or at least another decent TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: William T Bartels MD
Reviews.Content: For a "non smart TV", this TV is excellent. I read the other reviews and they were right on. My TV arrived in perfect shape. It was left at my door without a signature required. So if you live in an area where you're afraid that the TV might not be there when you get home, think twice! However, the TV is very, very nice. The stand is nice. Picture quality is very good. I'm no expert on picture quality, but it is very good in my opinion. Easy to set up.  No dead pixels. I could not be happier with my purchase. Go for it!!!

Reviews.Title: It was a good deal at the time, but I wouldn't purchase this TV again.
Reviews.Author: J. Franks
Reviews.Content: The TV was a good deal at the time that I purchased it, but due to an only average screen quality and below-par speakers I wouldn't buy it again.  The screen may say that is has a 240Hz LED picture, but I have seen several other brands that look better at 60Hz and 120Hz.  The speaker system is way under powered.  I had to turn the volume way up to listen to this TV at a normal sound level.  I had to hook up a sound system to have any decent sound.

Reviews.Title: Has given me full value for my money
Reviews.Author: Jeegar Mistry
Reviews.Content: Amazing clarity , only thing i feel refresh rate could have been better ,rest all is fine  , go for this TV all ends out , it will provide u your money's worth

Reviews.Title: Be wary of the warranty
Reviews.Author: captain flynn
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv based on having a warranty and the value. It broke within 5 months and when I called the company's warranty subcontractor, they wouldn't answer their phones for 2 straight weeks. Even amazon couldn't get a hold of them!!! Luckily, amazon's customer service is fantastic and replaced it for me. You're taking a chance seeing as how a warranty means nothing if they don't actually answer their phones. Spend a little more and go name brand. Typical Chinese made quality.

Reviews.Title: BLOWN AWAY BY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Bobbyinbristol
Reviews.Content: Received my TV 3 days early from  PILOT FREIGHT . I have read many negative reviews about these people but I was more than pleased . Driver arrived , plugged in TV to make sure it works and had me inspect it thoroughly before leaving. When I plugged it in and connected my DIRECT TV box , I was BLOWN AWAY by the picture quality even at the default settings .  Even the sound is much better than expected after a little tweaking . Remote is very easy to set . When programming to DIRECT TV remote simply use RCA CODE 11922. The bezel is thin and beautiful , and the high quality glass stand was easy to assemble. Hadn't heard of this brand but after some research , realized the CHINESE are marketing this television in the USA with the technology of the higher priced televisions from the US and Japan . I PROMISE YOU At 699 dollars you are getting 2000 quality...You will be as I said earlier BLOWN AWAY by the vivid colors ....

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Control
Reviews.Author: Deal Finder "Deal Finder"
Reviews.Content: Arrived today as scheduled.  CEVA is the shipper and it came with "white glove" service meaning they unpack it and turn it on.  Looked fine, and they left.An hour later I noticed a bright spot in the upper right.  I turned off the lights, thinking it was a reflection - nope.  It is a flaw in the display.Wednesday before the Superbowl - Amazon is sending a replacement that will arrive on Tuesday.  Bummer.  But the TV is watchable and they are doing the exchange, which is reasonable.

Reviews.Title: just bought a used one very pleased
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: i have been reading all the reveiws on this tv i just ordered a used one got fingers crossed that it works when it arrives tommorow i got the extended warranty so i cover ay self it looks great on the pics will tell you how it is once i get it

Reviews.Title: IT'S GREAT... *RELATIVELY*
Reviews.Author: Howard C. Tien "Howard911s"
Reviews.Content: I owned this TV for 3 weeks, watched it extensively.  For the price, there is no TV that come close to it.  Big 55 in, ultra slim, very bright, and color is nice..I'm an extremely picky person, not your average TV viewer.  I played sports, MKV 1080P movie files, blu-ray, don't get me wrong, the picture is great (outstanding for the size and price)... but something just seemed lacking.  After a while I realized it's a bit grainy a times regardless the type of aforementioned source I play it from and the overall color saturation seemed a bit lacking.  Also.. black seemed grayish sometimes.Most of all.. as some of the user reviewed, playing sport from HD cable box, watch Blu ray movie and 1080P file, I do not see any 240HZ effect (soap opera, or real life motion effect).  I have nothing to measure whether it's 240hz or not but does not seem to be a REAL 240hz TV.In all fairness, I'm an apple product user.. Macbook pro, Ipad (retina), Iphone 5.. which all use top of the line panel with great color and this TV just did not measure up to the color saturation of the aforementioned product I owned (not that it should, I understand you get what you pay for).  This may explain why I felt this TV's color and picture was lacking.I finally went to xxxxbuy and spent money on a Samsung LED 240HZ TV and played both side by side.  TCL is not bad at all and for the price, TCL is great! but in no way does it measure up to Samsung LED's picture.  I played exact same movie files, blu ray on both TV and Samsung displayed rich black, no grainy image and most of all, the Samsung 240hz instantly showed me what a TRUE 240hz should look like and that TCL was a bit lacking even though it advertised itself as such.Conclusion:  I returned the TCL and kept the Samsung.  TCL is a great TV if you understand "great" is relative to price.  Don't expect this TV to measure up to higher end Sony/Samsung and you will be happy with it.  You will NOT find a greater TV for the price, but if you are like me who is extremely picky on color saturation and picture quality, you might want to shell out a bit more money.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: smp89
Reviews.Content: I was very weary about purchasing this tv for my parents being that it is not a brand I am familiar with. I believe it is much better looking in person than in photos. I was worried the glass bottom would look cheesy, however, it looks nice. The sound is better than I expected from reading other reviews. The picture is sharp and comparable to many other medium grade tvs. Overall I am very pleased, as are my parents.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: alan
Reviews.Content: Great TV and even better price.I'm no HDTV expert, but have seen enough to know this one compares very well. And, for the price? Hard to beat.I researched "TCL" as it's a brand name I wasn't familiar with, but it turns out they've been around for years and this is what they do.Don't let the lack of a BIG brand name scare you away from this tv.

Reviews.Title: Product works but has a few bad qualities.
Reviews.Author: Medieval Fox
Reviews.Content: It's a nice price for a 55 inch but with the low price, comes your low quality additions.Although I cannot compare to another LED tv as this is the first one that I've owned, in comparison to a regular Lcd I think that the LCD tv has much clearer quality.  The few issues with this particular tv is that the images 'ghost trail' with movement [using DishNet and it doesn't do this on the LCD's.]  (example; The famous picture of a night highway with the lights trailing as the cars speed by.)  The tv has to 'warm up' I figure because it gets better the longer the tv is on also with Noise Reduction set to low.Using a ps3, the picture turns to blocky quality.  As in I see blocks from where I suppose the picture connects to the lights in squares under the screen.  Merely annoying, not supremely noticable but it is there. It's sort of like looking at your monitor and noticing the dots that make up your screen.For a big tv at such a low cost, issues are bound to be there even if it were at a higher cost.  However I still recommend this if yer looking to fill your living room with a large tv.

Reviews.Title: Moved my Sony to the Basement
Reviews.Author: Todd V. Evans
Reviews.Content: Bought the 55 inch for a workout room since I am only in there an hour or two.  Was blown away with the picture quality.  Was trying my best to find something wrong with this since it was so cheap so my brain was playing tricks on me.  Bottom line it only has two HDMI inputs and the remote sucks but I don't need more than this and have a harmony remote so I moved the Sony down and this is my new best friend.  Remember how you thought Hyundai and Kia were junk...watch out for TCL.

Reviews.Title: Arrived broken. Didn't like the display quality, so I just returned it.
Reviews.Author: WATYF
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV a couple of weeks ago. It arrived and I set it up only to find out that there was impact damage to the bottom of the screen. No cracks in the "glass", just a warp in the screen starting at the bottom that looked like someone dropped a pebble in water and ripples went out from it. It was most noticeable when the screen was a single color (like the default blue that shows up when there's no input) and was hard to notice when the TV was displaying a darker scene, so I was still able to evaluate it to see if I liked it. I considered getting a replacement, but after looking at the over-all display quality and the options on the TV, I decided that it just wasn't worth it.The display looks noticeably pixelated from a few feet away, and from several feet back, everything (especially people's faces) have that soft, cartoonish look to them that makes them look like they're wearing waaaay too much makeup. I've found this to be typical on low-priced LCD/LED TVs. My current LCD (which this TV was supposed to replace) has no such over-softening effect.Another issue was the near-complete lack of connections, primarily outputs. The inputs are rather limited (the analog and component inputs SHARE a video-in, so you can only use one at a time). I could have lived with that, but there were no outputs whatsoever except for a single S/PDIF out.In the end, I decided that a refund was preferable to getting it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: keen view
Reviews.Content: I have owned the TCL LE48FHDF3300ZTA 48-Inch for about 4 months.I have not called them for any warranty purposes so I am not sure in that area.Although I see from other reviews that warranty work is hard to obtain.Pros:-Good/ok picture quality for the price level-Light weight, easy to move or carry to another room-No large or excess areas around the frame/picture-Tuner appears to pick up local channels better than my older Vizio tv.Cons:-Poor audio quality, lacks base or there is non..-Slower to power on or change channels compared to my other tvs-most of the tv frame/case is thin except for the speaker area at the bottomso you could not place it flush against the wall.-only 2 HDMI ports compared to most of my other TVs having 3 HDMIs

Reviews.Title: Misleading specs and lower quality tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tv claims to be 240hz refresh rate but actually only 60hz native refresh. Before buying I called manufacturer to make sure it has native 240hz refresh rate and they confirmed it is infact 240hz native.When I got the device i found out it is only 60hz.Also it reflect poor quality on display. It did not give any audio at all and could not fix it even after resetting to factory default. May be some configuration setting issue that was not clear.Input type will keep blinking on screen every few seconds even when i did not touch or change input type at all.Overall i was ready for lower quality but did not think it would be horrible quality. Sorry to disappoint some of you with high hopes but i would recommand not to waste your time and energy on this brand until they improve quality to considerable levels.Seller were fair in return process.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product, crappy delivery service
Reviews.Author: Nina "sky"
Reviews.Content: Been a year since I bought it. Love it, still working & incredibly beautiful picture. The sound is definitely high, although I know some people who'd prefer higher volume. The settings were easy to use & I know people on here have said that you can improve the quality of the picture even further, but I don't like to tinker with what's already perfectly fine. Love the whole package. Warranty may have been unneccessary but still glad I have it.Now the only issue I had was the shipping. The company that delivered it to me attempted to call but when I didn't pick up the phone, they bypassed my location. They claimed that they stopped by. I work in the building I live in. I checked the cameras & I also spoke with security and the leasing office, there was no sign of them having come through. Trucks aren't allowed on our front lot so if they came, we'd know. I didn't like that they lied. It was very unprofessional & lazy. Even if the person doesn't pick up the call (I have bad reception b/c I live on the lake), you should still attempt to make the drop-off. The customer service rep acknowledged this as protocol. I had to wait a few more hours as they double-backed. When they came, they set the box down & attempted to leave. I asked them to wait because I needed to make sure it was in working condition. They hurried opening it, plugging it & I even asked them to test the remote. The service felt rushed so I didn't get a chance to really confront them about the lie. It didn't matter, I got my t.v & was happy with it. However, if you live in Ohio, make sure you're prepared for mediocre service.

Reviews.Title: If I could give 0 stars, I would.
Reviews.Author: S. Hylton "Sunny"
Reviews.Content: I thought I would give this TV a chance even though the reviews were hit and miss. For the cheap price, I figured it would be subpar but acceptable. However, 7 months later, it flat out doesn't work. I think if I would have hit the 1 year mark, I would chalk it up as a loss. The problem... I can turn the TV on with the remote or on the actual button panel but it does nothing but flash. Then, I can't turn it off or do anything. It has to be unplugged. Nothing more to describe because thats ALL it does. On top of everything else, TCL's customer service website says they are available by phone 9AM to 9PM EST but fails to mention this is only Monday through Friday. To make matters worse, their online contact us form doesn't work. You can type information in but once you submit you get an ERROR 500 message. Salt in a wound.... Do not buy. Spend a little more and get a national brand that people actually recognize.

Reviews.Title: TCL 48" Great basic set.
Reviews.Author: g wipper
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, great picture with two year limited warranty. But it is a LED backlit set not truly full LED  Thus 4 instead of 5 star.

Reviews.Title: HD Picture quality average
Reviews.Author: Datt Patel
Reviews.Content: Opened the box. Digital channel picture quality was average. Refresh rate was subpar when watching College Hoops in HD.  Sound quality is actually not bad.Honestly, I rather spend a couple hundred more and get a Samsung, Hitachi, or LG 3D.Dont be fooled by the advertised 240HZ refresh rate.Returned through Amazon instantly with excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Rock
Reviews.Content: 1. perfect picture2. Sounds ok3. with 2-year warranty4. compare to same size LED TV, price is right.

Reviews.Title: Returned two tv's
Reviews.Author: S. Schuchter
Reviews.Content: Each of the two tv's that we got began to flicker off with a blank screen for 2-4sec within two weeks of use. The picture also had horizontal lines of jumbled pixels 2in wide across the entire screen.. Amazon did a good job taking them back but it was still an unplesant experience.

Reviews.Title: Terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Melissa D. Faircloth
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV during the Black Friday sale, i am very pleased with the quality of the TV but the remote control only works part of the time.  I have called customer service three times, they had me reset it, change the batteries and told me i would have to go through Amazon to get the remote replaced.  They gave me the run-around until my 30 day warranty is up, now they say they can't do anything about the bad remote they sold me.  Come on, how hard it it to just send me a new remote?  They should make it good, but I'm still waiting on a call back from the TCL manager from the last call I placed.  Still waiting................

Reviews.Title: This is a personal viewpoint
Reviews.Author: Lonnie Nichols
Reviews.Content: I rated this TV a four because it exposes flaws in content. Some over-the-air stations broadcast apparently in a narrower bandwidth than others and perhaps with a lower quality of content being shown. And while the viewing is unsettling, I want to see the difference in quality on the screen. I've found this TV is very pleasant to watch when the content is high resolution and well encoded. Most DVD movies are very sharp on this screen. But I think this TV is well situated to watch future higher quality content due to its 240Hz feature. It may take a short time to get used to the 240Hz capability initially, but in my case it quickly has become the new normal for watching TV.

Reviews.Title: TCL
Reviews.Author: Mohando
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. I have a LG and this one performs just as well if not slightly better with a faster refresh rate and LEDS. Great TV.

Reviews.Title: a wonderful surprise
Reviews.Author: av
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried that this TV sounded too good to be true for the price. However, the picture is great, the TV looks sleek, and I couldn't be happier. Picture isn't as great as a samsung or sony but at a fraction of the cost does it really matter?

Reviews.Title: Great tv but....
Reviews.Author: Janue
Reviews.Content: The remote won't program completely to my directv remote. I love the picture and quality of the tv though. I think that just because it isn't a well known brand it isn't on their code list. Other than that, would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: tcl
Reviews.Author: paul colucci jr.
Reviews.Content: I love the TCL, nice picture, easy to set up, no complaints, in fact, I bought 2 of them, high regards to this t.v, at bargen prices

Reviews.Title: TCL TV has low quality internal speakers
Reviews.Author: William G. Johnson Jr
Reviews.Content: THe speakers are really bad, have to use external speakers from my audio system, found a way to connect since TV does not have output RCA jacks, only a jack for headphones, so connected my sterio using that jack point with a special cable adapter.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Mandi B
Reviews.Content: So I was concerned, being that TCl is not a "known brand", but after some research and reading other reviews I found out it is not some back alley brand either.  I bought this V, and I was amazed!  It is bright and crisp!  I also bought a PS3, because I got the TV to play it, and it's amazing.  I have not had any trouble with the color or the sound.  For the price it definately worth the risk, and if you don;t like it, send it back because there is a 30 day money back guarentee on it.  You have nothing to lose

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: bob berra
Reviews.Content: TV takes a while for picture to come on when turning it on. Over all, I think its a good tv.

Reviews.Title: TCL 48 in 1080p 240Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: I liked price,picture is good after fine tuning.Sound okay after fine tuning.I don't like all the red in the picture,the only way to get it out is to put it on personal setting & turning the color way down & turning the green tint up quite a bit.If you use any preset picture setting you can't adjust the red or color.With everything adjusted in personal mode it not to bad,but don't put it next to your Sony or even your inexpensive Haier .For 200-300 dollars less it's okay.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: J. Holt
Reviews.Content: Wondering if I'm crazy or just got a dud because I cannot concur with the mostly positive reviews for this TV. The HD picture is grainy, the colors are dull despite obsessive tinkering with the settings, lines and letters are jagged, and motion blur is obvious and prevalent no matter the medium. Standard def channels are nearly unwatchable.I'll be returning this unit ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Ok. Not great.
Reviews.Author: Kirby L. Brown
Reviews.Content: This is a sports bar TV. Throw it on the wall. It's thin and pretty. If you're looking for amazing picture quality then this is not the set for you. I'd recommend a TV in the next price tier. You get more picture quality for your buck. This is not a bad TV by any means. I just realized after I got it and used it for a couple of weeks that I was looking for something with a bit better color accuracy, screen uniformity, back lit LED (not side lit like this one; it's a night and day difference) and deeper black levels. I would recommend it for budget tight consumers looking for a very basic upgrade or replacement.

Reviews.Title: The worst customer service ever!!!
Reviews.Author: mswex
Reviews.Content: I bought a TCL TV through Amazon.  The TV worked for about a year, and then began flickering.  The flickering got worse and worse.  It was still under warranty so I called TCL.  What a joke.  Four months later, and NOTHING is fixed or replaced.  I get a lot of "Oh, I don't know why no one has gotten back to you!?!"  Or, they simply hang up on you and act like it was a technical glitch.  Buy a real brand, with real customer support.

Reviews.Title: It is not 240Hz as it claimed
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Yun Lee
Reviews.Content: When it is powered on, the screen shows 60Hz, not as the title claimed 240Hz. That is huge difference as we expected.

Reviews.Title: Audio
Reviews.Author: harley2003
Reviews.Content: This tv has a mediocre picture quality. If you are going to try and hook this up to a sound bar or home theater system-good luck. It has one audio output and it is not compatible with anything we have tried. Lesson learned-make sure the tv you choose has multiple input and output options. This one does not. Tech support was not knowledgeable about hooking this tv to a sound bar either.

Reviews.Title: Amazon employees told me?
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: Amazon employees told me NOT to purchase this TV, but I did, what a mistake!!The unit had a defective sound control problem.So we purchased the  50" Toshiba LED 120hz w/3HDMI, WOW! What great TV!!We will Purchase the New 60" Toshiba Next Year!

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: Ray b Parker
Reviews.Content: worked great for a month then just wouldnt turn back on go with a diff brand not worth the buy

Reviews.Title: poor resolution, poor sound first and last TCL
Reviews.Author: Gregory
Reviews.Content: excited to open my package when I connect my TV after and play with my PS3 note that the resolution is poor and the sound very bad, import this product from USA to Venezuela and therefore I have no longer warranty, after a week of use I went one vertical black stripe on the right side of the screen, I'm 100% disappointed in the purchase of this product, a very bad investment.

Reviews.Title: zooooom!!!!
Reviews.Author: Immaculee gedine
Reviews.Content: This tv came so fast I received it literally the day after, the picture is good, sound is ok only thing is when setting it up the needles that come with didn't fit so I had to use my own the tv holding up ok alil sshaky if you move definetly got to get it mount to the wall but other than that its nice tv comes with warranty so you can't loose its a good deal for that price

Reviews.Title: stoped working after a month
Reviews.Author: reyes casanova
Reviews.Content: the tv it self was good, decent picture and the size was amazing. but it stopped working only after a moth of purchase.  amazon took care of it, great customer service but to bad the tv didnt last longer.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Picture
Reviews.Author: J. Cornell "jerseyshore71"
Reviews.Content: The Only thing I didnt like about it is that Tiger Direct had it $100.00 cheaper 2 weeks later online....

Reviews.Title: Sound is bad  you will need external receiver
Reviews.Author: D. Pilon
Reviews.Content: Get this TV ONLY if you have one external audio receiver with speakers (connected to your DVD,BR o cable box and NOT to this TV).Sound is horrible!  If you are watching movie you can barely understand and hear voices. Worst part is you CAN NOT connect it to eternal speakers because you need SPECIAL adapter (analog/digital) and cable (both not included) .

Reviews.Title: It's a wonderful TV with this price
Reviews.Author: Ying Wang "Computer Man"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV just a few days ago. So far so good.Two things I don't like:1) It starts up slowly: it takes around 5 seconds to show the first frame after poweron.2) The sound is not good: it sounds a little bit hollow to me. Also even if I turned the volume up to 70, the sound is still too low for me.

Reviews.Title: 240hz?/ where?
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: love the tv great price for what it is ... but i dont feel it is a 240hz refresh rate.... its not that clear.

Reviews.Title: QUESTION REFRESH RATE
Reviews.Author: READ ME
Reviews.Content: Are you able to change the refresh rate?I have a Hannspree that in the Set Up> Vivid Motion> you can select Off, Low, Medium, High,and that correlates to Off is a 60 Hz, Low is a 80Hz, Medium is a 100 and high is a 120Hz. It's easy to see the difference in the motion esp. when fast.I know what another poster meant when he posted he sees 60 Hz on his GPU video card properties and no other refresh rate is selectable from his PC: But, Any adjustable refresh rate settings in the menu in the TCL for refresh settings.Example: 60Hz, 80, 100, 120Hz, 240Hzor low medium high in TCL's menu??If there is no selection available in the TCL at all and all you can see in your video card adjustment menu is 60 Hz then that leads me to believe that these TCL's are 60 Hz and not 240 Hz as advertised.AND WHILE I'M HERE, TIGERDIRECT JUST SOLD THE 48" FOR $ 349.99 TODAY!

Reviews.Title: Good picture but not 240Hz
Reviews.Author: omonreal
Reviews.Content: I got the 48" tcl led tv as a gift. My brother bought it for me because he knew how much I wanted the 240Hz. When it arrived all looked good. There was no damage to the box. The only thing I question is whether it was suppose to be shipped upside down???? I thought that was odd. But anyways, unpacked it. Setup the stand. Plugged in all the cables. Using HDMI on my Directtv, I though the picture was going to be awesome, now that i had a 240Hz. NOPE!!! there is absolutely no difference from this TV and my old 8 year old LCD tv. The picture quality does seem a little better, but still the same 60Hz refresh rate. I'am very disappointed that TCL markets this TV as being 240Hz when it looks the same as a 60Hz  TV. My wife, who isn't tech savvy, said the same thing.Is it just me with this problem? I tried looking in the menu options but theres no adjustment for resolution. Anyone else seeing this issue?I don't think I would ever purchase a TV from TCL. I haven't talked to my bro about this, but I'm sure he will agree to send it back and buy a "name brand" tv.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed at all
Reviews.Author: theblob654
Reviews.Content: I gave it one star because the first TV I recieved had a huge crack in the screen.  So I called amazon and they had a new one sent out to mee right away.  The return went very smooth and quickly.  I recieved the replacement 4 days later to set the tv up and one of the hdmi ports does not have sound.  I am now scared to send it back since I am afraid the new one ill get is worse than this one.  I reccomend checking out some other products or companies to buy from.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!
Reviews.Author: melissa bates
Reviews.Content: When this item was shipped-we didnt get it for almost a month-we ended up having to go pick it up out of the shippers warehouse-now,that we have had it for a month,it already has a problem.There is a white light showing through the bottom of the screen through the picture.TCL will fix it,but we have to ship it back.And because it took so long to receive it,we are out of Amazons coverage.I do not recommend buying this.I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV for the price, Disapointed in the 240HZ!!!
Reviews.Author: Moreso
Reviews.Content: Great HD TV for the price, Disappointing in the 240HZ!!!. Beautiful Picture, Adequate Sound, Adequate inputs, Minimum Power Usage, but for those that are looking for the {soap opera effect/Tru Motion Feature}, this so called 240HZ TV is not for u....

Reviews.Title: TV is great, amazon is what gets the stars docked
Reviews.Author: Skillet 82
Reviews.Content: Ill start off saying the TV is great, i have had it for a few months now and there is nothing wrong, got it for a good bargain.Now the reason i dinged a couple stars (otherwise a nice 5 star rating) is because of amazon,So i was looking at the TVs and saw 3 or 4 "like new" and one of them had a stand missing, so i obviously chose one with the stand included, then to my dismay when it arrived it had no stand, which i was planning on using, but now that i had no stand i had to go fork out a couple hundred more dollars on a new TV stand that could hold a 55 inch on the back.I feel a little sad that the item gets docked because of amazon, but having the shell out a couple hundred dollars for their mistake pissed me off pretty bad, i mean, who likes to spend a few hundred more than they have to.but otherwise, love amazon and this TVGreat buy!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: Shannon Skogrand
Reviews.Content: All the numbers look great but product is just mediocre.Dislike - the picture quality - not very clear and has blur(square blocks) when there is action on TV. HDTV channels are much clearer and less blur.Everything else seems to be good.Would not buy again, would wait and spend the extra money on a better picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment with 48" TCL
Reviews.Author: the_architekt
Reviews.Content: If you're expecting this TV to look as good as a quality, higher end LED HD television, you may be disappointed. I thought I would upgrade from my Samsung 720p DLP. Honestly though, the 720p DLP is more pleasant to watch. The most glaring weakness of the TCL is the obvious jagged edges of even moderately large on-screen text. It seems as if the edges of the text aren't anti-aliased, or that the contrast on the TCL is so poor that its not capable of anti-aliasing the text with any convincing quality. Another weakness is in the lack of contrast in the whites. If you're watching a sporting event where the players are wearing white uniforms, you'll cringe. I've played with all the picture settings over several days and this TV just doesnt seem to do very good grey scales. What the TCL will do is reasonably good, sharp mid-tones with nice vibrant colors.BTW, I've viewed DirecTV HD and Bluray DVD so far with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Caution: TCL does not honor their warranty
Reviews.Author: Tab Numlock
Reviews.Content: They will claim you dropped it. Mine was treated gingerly (BTW, I don't have kids). I finally had to threaten to stand in front of Walmart with a protest sign to get satisfaction. Nothing from TCL tho.

Reviews.Title: REVIEW TCL 48IN TV
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: NOT QUITE AS EXPECTED HAVE AN ISSUE WITH THE SO CALLED 240hZ i CAN SEE A LITTLE MOTION WHEN PEOPLE ARE OBJECTS ARE MOVING BUT THE QUALITY OF THE REST OF THE FEATURES ARE FINE SUCH AS COLOR AND EASE OF OPERATION. tHERE IS ONE COMPLAINT i HAVE FOUND AS MANY OTHERS HAVE THAT OUR CABLE COMPANIES CANNOT PROGRAM THE VOLUME CONTROL WITH THERE REMOTES THEREFORE TWO REMOTES ARE NEEDED ONE FOR CHANNEL AND ONE FOR VOLUME.

Reviews.Title: Annoying screws, no Comcast code?
Reviews.Author: M Twain
Reviews.Content: I had to look at another review and put Pam on my screws to actually get it into the TV stand.  Furthermore, I haven't been able to program my Comcast remote.  The quality is great though, but I had to get rid of 1 star because of the hard setup.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Prof1
Reviews.Content: The Good:1. The TV looks great (when it is off); "appears" to be a quality-built item; thin bezel is a plus2. The price is awesome for a 55" LED--great 2 yr warranty3. The colors are very vivid!! Great color!4. I can't comment on the sound because I am using a high-end A/V receiver for thisThe BAD:1.  Extremely BAD picture!!! BAD, BAD, BAD!!  I can't emphasize enough how bad the picture quality is despite the nice color quality.  The picture is very "fuzzy", in some cases the text and other images are downright blurry. (my old tube TV looks better--not kidding) BTW, I have HD digital cable and a great Sony Blu Ray player--and great eye sight.  I have attempted every possible way of adjusting the picture.  This picture is extremely poor. This does NOT appear to be 1080 HD--not even close!!! I called the cable company--they indicate everything is fine from their end. Image from Blu Ray is fair at best.  I am absolutely dismayed by all of the positive reviews regarding the picture quality--maybe I got a lemon???2.  The manual is very brief and offers little info in the troubleshooting section. Customer service keeps banking hours; good luck reaching them.Bottom Line: I am VERY dissatisfied.  Even at this great price this TV is not worth it. Sorry to say, I plan on returning it ASAP and will not chance wasting more time on a TCL!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible Customer Service DO NOT BUY ANYTHING MADE BY TCL
Reviews.Author: J. Ault
Reviews.Content: I have an 5 year old RCA TV which was produced by TTE Technologies. This is their Web site: [...] which clearly states that TTE is a part of TCL. I have called the service number on this Web site and the number on the back of my TV on at least six different occasions. Each time I asked to speak to a supervisor and none were available. I was simply told that they do not support this model of TV, and that this is "TCL" we do not support TTE TVs. Will they still support their own branded TV in a few years? Probably not, if they are not willing to support a TV that was made by their own company only 5 years ago. They are cheap, but as always, you get what you pay for...UpdateAfter submitting a complaint to the BBB, I received an email and a phone call. At that point the company provided me with what I had tried to request all along. A user manual... They also provided the number for a certified repair center (which was one digit off, but I was able to look up the correct phone number). This is intended as a warning to those considering purchasing a TV made by this company.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Warranty, do not trust them!
Reviews.Author: J. Ross
Reviews.Content: Do not buy TCL TVS for their warranty. If something happens to you TV do not expect much help. Their customer service is almost non existent. Everytime you call you have to wait 30minutes-1hour on the phone, they probably only have 1 person answering the phones. When you do get a hold of someone they either transfer you to someone else, tell you to call a different number, or hang up and tell you to call back later. I have spent at least 4 hours on hold with them so far and my TV has not even been fixed yet.I had a problem with the TV within 1 month of turning it on. That was 3 months ago. I am still trying to get them to fix it. It took a month of calling them and trying to give them information before they sent an independent worker to my house. He could not fix the probably so they told me I had to send the TV back to them. After another few weeks they finally shipped me a box to send it back to them in, except I have to pay $80 to ship it back! Seeing as I bought the TV for around $300 I don't even know if it's worth it to pay that because even if I do receive a TV back (which I'm sure will take another few months) who knows if that one will work.Don't rely on their 2 year warranty because it sure isn't worth anything but long hold times and months of waitingUpdate: Well a few weeks later they finally fixed the label so I didn't have to pay $80 tho ship it back.. I shipped it back over 1 month ago but still nothing! Everytime I call they tell me they will look into it and then they never call me back! This is starting to get ridiculous.. it's been over 4 months since I started with their "warranty" and it's driving me crazy.AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST. They are scammers and frauds.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth your Money!!!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I was very skeptical about buying this Tv, I never heard of the TCL brand but after reading the reviews I gave it a chance. I thought a 55" led tv under $700 that's a steal, Ok I receive Tv my first thought it look good, nice picture quality but its not a 240 kHz at all,  the remote sensor wasn't responding to the remote so I contacted Amazon they shipped out an replacement. While waiting for the replacement the original Tv blow completely out on me, after less than a week, so I had enough and called Amazon so they could stop delivery of the new Tv and also return the original.  I know a lot of people gave good reviews and maybe I was just unlucky and receive a bad Tv but I don't like gambling with hard earn Money,  sometimes in life you've to go with your gut. My gut was telling me not to buy a Brand of Tv you never heard of and paying  a couple of hundred more for a brand name is the smart move. So that's what I did for about $150 more then I spent on this Tv I purchased an 55" LG  led tv on Amazon for $ 799 a brand that I love.

Reviews.Title: TCL Sucks
Reviews.Author: Allen
Reviews.Content: I hooked this TV up and the Video/Audio jacks do not work with my cable box or any device.  I cannot believe all the positive comments from people about this TV - TRUST ME!  It is garbage, garbage, garbage!!!  The picture is the worst I have ever seen.  My 48" plasma that is 7 years old, blows this TCL picture away.  Everything shows a blurry outline and the colors suck - no matter how much you play with the settings.  There is no way this is a 240 Hz refresh rate, it's not even close.  Absolutely worse TV I have ever bought and I am in the process of requesting a refund, completely disappointed.  Spend the extra $$ and get a nice brand name, and forget all the bogus feedback regarding this junk led tv.

Reviews.Title: Not all that
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: After much debate whether to buy this tv or not, I ended up buying a black Friday Vizio 60 inch for $688. Got it home to find out it had a green line in the bottom right screen making hard to watch and the audio out ( RCA and headphone out ) worked for only 20 minutes. So I've been looking at and researching this tcl for sometime now and decided to buy it. It arrived on time and in perfect shape. I set up this beautiful tv and scanned in the channels via cable box to find it only found 1 channel, re-scanned it and this time it found 12. knowing I have 59 channels I scanned directly from the coax cable and it only showed 12 again. Not being able to wait any longer I ended my set-up session and started the tv in which it miraculously had all 59 channels. Wow. Looking at this picture was in fact horrible. It didn't have the soap opera effect as some say a 240hz would have.Though, sports was in fact better, being a little better then horrible not saying much. My media center pc looked o.k.. so if you need a 55 inch pc monitor it will work. This tcl is the worst picture I've ever seen. What did I learn from all this? I'm a cheap A$$. btw. Amazon is great.
